question: From which one of the following nations the Kingdom of Bahrain got its independence in 1971?
explanation: In 1971, the Kingdom of Bahrain got independence from The United Kingdom. During 1860, the Government of British India colonized Bahrain. The Government of British India signed a treaty with Al Khalifas of Bahrain placing Bahrain under British rule and protection. In 1892, Britain officially established complete dominance over Bahrain which triggered massive unrest among Bahraini locals against Britishers. On 15 August 1971, Bahrain got independence.
